block.description: The namespace and ID of the block to place.
block.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the block to place.

type.description:
[Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/add_block)

Adds a block at the specified action position. Adding means setting the block at the position, offset by the direction of the action.

Type ID: `origins:add_block`
